descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 25 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
#                                                                                                                                                                                                      
[media]
**The Tavern of Lost Souls is Now Open**

Experience an intense and immersive dive into the watery underworld of pirate bartending!
[media]
**Protect your Booty**

Build out your tavern, raise your fortunes, strengthen your firepower! Lest we forget -- greed in this world can never be sated. 

[media]
**The Dreaded Debt Collector is Coming. Will you be Prepared?**

Down here, new management means nothing to those still collecting on the debt of your infamous, tomb-sunken father!
[media]

**The Tavern of Lost Souls is Now Open**

Experience an intense and immersive dive into the watery underworld of pirate bartending!
![{"height":640,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499619145_2277648666027610_6685137458776399597_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=a7F9WYBAXU4Q7kNvwH_nxcE&_nc_oc=Admf40UDfCSFqWQ-x0sEK5_BzKSWYgmZrpUfRbjTYAyfX_ijZyCnhEJkCOFuLQ1NlTo&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=QgHiaw2xEVoEl-BKsWPlTw&oh=00_Afk4ypZxKPaAnZIj19dE7lSsRAzpz7W76_0niMZd4hZyUg&oe=69535F5D)
**Protect your Booty**

Build out your tavern, raise your fortunes, strengthen your firepower! Lest we forget -- greed in this world can never be sated. 

![{"height":640,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491827595_1865364267642362_1367380357141131817_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Qc9R9oOXVWgQ7kNvwFyirHH&_nc_oc=AdmeIPH4Gad6jQtUZWNa4fDiV-ukRY9hhROSe6dzhpzLrRlezLLMKeokbcevQD1LRxQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=QgHiaw2xEVoEl-BKsWPlTw&oh=00_Afl4QGIoaoUFqo0nhY4jJ5aELThRXqsX5iSt1JN9nvu7eA&oe=69533283)
**The Dreaded Debt Collector is Coming. Will you be Prepared?**

Down here, new management means nothing to those still collecting on the debt of your infamous, tomb-sunken father!
